description: Does 3D Edge detection using the library 3DEdge

verbose.title: Verbose flag
verbose.description: Print out some information along the way

prefix.title: Prefix of output
prefix.description: Sets the prefix of the output dataset

datum.title: Output datum
datum.description: Sets the datum of the output dataset

fscale.title: Force scaling flag
fscale.description: Force scaling of the output to the maximum integer range

gscale.title: Global scaling flag
gscale.description: Same as '-fscale', but also forces each output sub-brick to get the same scaling factor

nscale.title: No scaling flag
nscale.description: Don't do any scaling on output to byte or short datasets

scale_floats.title: Scale floats
scale_floats.description: Multiply input by VAL, but only if the input datum is float.

automask.title: Automask flag
automask.description: For automatic internal calculation of a mask in the usual AFNI way
